# shouldShowLinkedPeople

**Instance Property**

Indicates whether the person view should display data from person records that are linked with the person record being displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var shouldShowLinkedPeople: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Linked records represent the same actual person, and typically come from different sources.

## Working with Person Views

- **editing**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the person view is in editing mode.
- **person**: The contact record being displayed.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the person view is in editing mode.
